formalpara.title: Internal help for this AGI command in Asterisk 1.4:

para.screen: Usage: ANSWER Answers channel if not already in answer state. Returns -1 on channel failure, or 0 if successful.

formalpara.title: Diff of the internal help from Asterisk 1.2 to 1.4:
Diff of the internal help from Asterisk 1.4 to 1.6:

para.screen: --- in Asterisk 1.4 +++ in Asterisk 1.6 @@ -1,3 +1,4 @@ Usage: ANSWER Answers channel if not already in answer state. Returns -1 on channel failure, or 0 if successful. + Runs Dead : No
